mesquite.lib

Class Number2DArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.Number2DArray

  • public class Number2DArray
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store numbers flexibly, so that system doesn't need to know whether int, long or double. Automatically upgrades to use long or double as needed. This stores a whole 2Darray of similarly typed numbers. For single numbers, use NumberObjects instead.
